row.process:
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred
! :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_LDAP_PASSWORD#" ! :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH ! :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
$Pass = "&PASSWORD#" $User = "&USER#" $VsphereServer = "&VSPHERE_SERVER#"
$Password = ConvertTo-SecureString "$Pass" -AsPlainText -Force ! Write-host $mycredentials = New-Object System.management.Automation.PSCredential ("$User",$Password) ! $mycredentials = New-Object System.management.Automation.PSCredential ("$User",$Password)
Add-PsSnapin VMware.VimAutomation.Core Write-host Connect-VIServer -Server $VsphereServer -Protocol https -Username $User -Password $Pass Connect-VIServer -Server $VsphereServer -Protocol https -Username $User -Password $Pass
! Enable-ADAccount -Server $LdapHost -credential $mycredentials -Identity $sAMA
! :IF &PS_OS# = "Linux"
! $custSpec=New-OSCustomizationSpec -OSType Linux -Domain &WF_DOMAIN# ` ! -Name &WF_CUSTOM_NAME# ` ! -Type Persistent ` ! -DnsServer &WF_DNS_SERVER_PRIMARY#, &WF_DNS_SERVER_SECONDARY# ` ! -DnsSuffix &WF_DNS_SUFFIX#
! $osCust = Get-OSCustomizationSpec $custSpec -Type Persistent | ` ! Get-OSCustomizationNicMapping | ` ! Set-OSCustomizationNicMapping -IPMode UseStaticIP -IpAddress &WF_IP_ADDRESS# ` ! -SubnetMask &WF_SUBNET_MASK# -DefaultGateway &WF_DEFAULT_GATEWAY#
! :ELSE
! : IF &PS_OS# = "Windows" !$custSpec=New-OSCustomizationSpec -OSCustomizationSpec Write-host Get-VM "&VM_NAME_FINAL#" | Get-NetworkAdapter | Set-NetworkAdapter -StartConnect:$true -Confirm:$false Get-VM "&VM_NAME_FINAL#" | Get-NetworkAdapter | Set-NetworkAdapter -StartConnect:$true -Confirm:$false
Start-VM -VM &VM_NAME_FINAL# -Confirm:$false Write-Host 'VM &VM_NAME_FINAL# has been started'
! : ENDIF
! :ENDIF
! :INCLUDE JOBI.IAAS.VCENTER_DISCONNECT
! delete ! Add-PsSnapin VMware.VimAutomation.Core -ea "SilentlyContinue" ! Connect-VIServer &WF_VCENTER# -Protocol https -User &WF_VCENTER_USER# -Password &WF_VCENTER_PWD# ! Remove-OSCustomizationSpec &WF_CUSTOM_NAME# -Confirm:$false ! Disconnect-VIServer -Server &WF_VCENTER# -Confirm:$false
! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
